title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count - the perfect writing companion for all your creative endeavors!

Crafted with excellence and backed by over 100 years of tradition, these pencils are the epitome of quality and reliability. The exclusive #2 graphite formula ensures smooth performance, allowing you to effortlessly bring your ideas to life. With a thick core, these pencils deliver consistent lines, making them ideal for both writing and drawing.

We take pride in our commitment to sustainability, which is why our pencils are made from premium wood harvested from responsibly managed forests. The golden yellow lacquered finish adds a touch of elegance, while the matte coating provides a comfortable grip for extended use.

No need to waste time sharpening - these pencils come pre-sharpened and ready to use. And when mistakes happen, our latex-free eraser will remove marks completely without smudging, ensuring a clean and professional finish. The signature green & gold ferrule adds a touch of sophistication to these already exceptional pencils.

Rest assured, our pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for use by both children and adults. Trusted by teachers worldwide, these Ticonderoga pencils are the preferred choice in classrooms everywhere.

Join the Ticonderoga (Dixon Ticonderoga family) and experience the difference that over a century of craftsmanship can make. With a count of 30, these pencils will keep you supplied for countless projects and creative pursuits.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils for a premium writing experience that will inspire your imagination.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count, and experience the difference that exceptional quality can make in your creative journey.
